Description: Papyrus; Hieratic text: House of Life; vignettes in red and black.
Curator's comments: Published : Derchain, P. Le papyrus Salt 825 (B.M. 10051) : rituel pour la conservation de la vie en Égypte (Brussels, 1965). Cabrol, Les voies processionnelles de Thebes, OLA 97 (2001), p. 686. G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.30.
See J. Quack, 'Beitraege zu einigen religioesen und magischen Texte', in M. Collier and S. Snape (ed.), Ramesside Studies in Honour of K. A. Kitchen (Bolton 2011), 416 [on 7.8, 15.7 f].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57505) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57505)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss Black ink Pigment (loss) Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Sandwich: board Binding: leather (loose, deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: good
